content: अकर {%<ab>a.</ab>%} [न. ब.] {@--1@} Handless, maimed. {@--2@} Exempt from tax or duty. {@--3@} [न. त.] Not doing or acting; not disposed to work, ceasing from work. --रा <ab>N.</ab> of a plant आमलकी, Emblic Myrobalan, Phyllanthus Emblica (अकं दुःखं सेवनात् लोकानां राति गृह्णाति नाशयतीति; रा-क <ls>Tv.</ls>)
